translations: vt.巧妙处理；以偷牌方式先出

phrs.translation: 飞牌, 偷牌, 手腕, 细腻的口感
武器娴熟, 武器纯熟, 称手武器, 器熟练
深飞, 超酷双明手分析工具
技巧射门, 巧射, 推射, 拍摄技巧

sentences.sentence: Most common pin and tumbler locks can be picked with a little luck and finesse—so before you call a locksmith, try this.
sentences.translation: 用一点运气加上策略，大多普通的弹子锁都能被打开——所有在你请锁匠之前，尝试一下这个。

sentences.sentence: It can be easily recognizable by the extreme finesse of their printing on satin papers.
sentences.translation: 它可以通过在缎纹纸上印刷的极高技巧来轻松识别。

sentences.sentence: Once, in finesse of fiddles found I ecstasy.
sentences.translation: 曾经，在小提琴的精妙里我找到狂喜。
